sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Ukraine has received its first shipment of weapons from the United States as tensions with Moscow continue to build.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, Russia and Belarus prepare for joint war games.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Over 300,000 people take part in a day of early voting ahead of Portugal's general election on the 30th.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: 15 Taliban officials have arrived in Norway for their first official talks with the West on human rights and humanitarian aid.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The U.S. has sent 91,000 kilograms of weapons and ammunition to Ukraine in the face of growing Russian aggression.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: While top diplomats from Washington and Moscow agreed to keep dialogue going following talks in Geneva last Friday, U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken has warned that there will be grave consequences if the Kremlin launches an attack.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: U.S. President Joe Biden is also meeting with his national security advisers in Camp David this weekend to discuss the most appropriate course of action.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile the British government have accused Russia of trying to replace Ukraine's government with a pro-Moscow administration.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The UK Foreign Secretary Liz Truss has tweeted that the plot will not be tolerated.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: This comes as Germany's Navy chief stepped down on Saturday after drawing criticism for saying Russia's President Vladimir Putin deserved respect and that Kiev would never take back axed Crimea from Moscow.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Moving east, Russia has begun relocating fighter jets to Belarus, ahead of joint military drills.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The Allies have agreed to train together on Belarusian territory from 10 to 20 February.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Russian territory from 10 to 20 February. Estonia, Latvia and Lithuania plan to send US-endorsed anti-tank and anti-aircraft missiles to Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: This comes amid Kiev's escalating tensions with Russia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: While the Baltic states support Ukraine's sovereignty and territorial integrity, Moscow has amassed some 100,000 troops near the border, prompting fears of an invasion.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: However, Dmitry Peshkov, the spokesperson for the Kremlin, says the shipments do nothing to reduce tensions, and described the West supplying arms to Ukraine as extremely dangerous.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile some 200 demonstrators in Kiev formed a human chain on Saturday to celebrate 103 years of unity between Ukraine's eastern and western territories.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The rally was also a signal to Russia that the former Soviet republic stands together despite the military build-up.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: This woman said, despite all the propaganda, despite all the Russian misleading information, despite all of Vladimir Putin's pressure, Ukraine is united. While this activist said, In the past, they already tried to divide Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: We made conclusions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: We won't let them split us.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Over 14,000 people have been killed in nearly eight years of fighting in Donbas, where the Moscow-supported insurgency erupted shortly after Crimea was annexed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: A day of early voting in Portugal's general elections started on Sunday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Over 300,000 voters signed up to vote a week ahead of time, as the option was opened to a wide range of people to reduce crowding on election day.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Prime Minister Ant√≥nio Costa, a member of the incumbent socialists, was one such voter and he encouraged everyone to take part.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Voting is the most important moment of democracy. It's a unique moment when only citizens decide what the outcome of the elections will be. It's when they decide what they want for their future and they choose their representatives.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Participation in the electoral process is the most important act of democratic vitality and I want to appeal to all the Portuguese to exercise their civic right today if they were registered for early voting or in a week's time as usual.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: A snap election was called after Costa failed to secure support for his 2022 budget.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: It's the first time this has happened in the country since the return to democratic rule. Polls show that the incumbent Socialist Party has a 38 percent support. Their main rivals, the Social Democratic Party, have 30 percent, which could leave the socialists without a working majority once again.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Taliban representatives are in Oslo for their first official talks with the West on European soil since they seized power in Afghanistan last August.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: While the Norwegian Foreign Minister, Anneken Huitveld, stressed her government does not recognise the hardline Islamists, she said we cannot allow the political situation lead to an even worse humanitarian disaster.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The delegation will join women's rights activists in the first of their closed-door meetings.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Abdul Qahar Balke, a Taliban official, tweeted these pictures of the 15-member all-male team after leaving Kabul on Saturday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: However, the three-day talks with the group, which is still blacklisted as a terrorist organization, has caused mixed reactions in Norway.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Some demonstrators gathered outside the Ministry of Foreign Affairs in Oslo, while an initiator of the protests said, we do not want the Taliban here in Norway, they do not represent us.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The Islamic fundamentalists largely trampled on human rights during their first stint in power, while women are still largely excluded from public sector jobs and secondary education.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Dozens of soldiers and civilians have been killed in Syria following a vicious assault

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: on a Kurdish-controlled detention centre in the city of Hasakah.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: More than 100 Islamic State militants using machine guns and explosives launched the attack on Gawaira prison on Thursday, where many jihadists were being held. The These were the deadliest IS-led attacks in Syria and Iraq since the fall of their caliphate three years ago.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: As the fighting rages for a third day, the US-backed Kurdish security forces have brought reinforcements into Hasakah to regain control of areas taken by the Islamic State.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, the battles have triggered a mass exodus from Gowaira's surrounding neighbourhoods.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: have triggered a mass exodus from Gowaira's surrounding neighbourhoods. Thousands have left their homes near the prison, fleeing to nearby areas where their relatives live.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: But not all the displaced have a safe haven.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Heavy gunfire has been heard in several barracks across Burkina Faso, including in the capital.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The government has denied reports that a coup is underway or that President Roche Cabore has been detained.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: However, the reported gunshots come a day after several hundred people protested in Ouagadougou at the government's inability to stop jihadist attacks spreading across the country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The aftermath of last week's volcanic eruption and tsunami in Tonga is still wreaking havoc across the island nation. Aerial photos show scenes from before and after, and much of the land is now covered in ash. A clean-up is underway, but water supplies have been polluted. Residents are determined to rebuild their homes, however it is likely the tsunami will have long-term effects. Agriculture is a mainstay of our economy and my understanding is that the ash fell has somewhat compromised that. We don't have an extensive survey on how much of the crops

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: have been damaged but I understand from the farmers that they are very concerned. And I think a press release from the government estimated over 80% of the population was affected." Tonga is in need of international aid. The Defence Forces of Japan, New Zealand and Australia have all started delivering relief supplies like water. However there are fears that COVID-19 could be taken to the island creating the possibility of a new challenge. Waves from the tsunami were felt across the Pacific. In Peru, a three-month ecological emergency has been declared after they caused an oil spill.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: A refinery leaked 6,000 barrels into the sea.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Three beaches have been closed off and authorities there are calling it an ecological disaster.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Inflation and the cost of living in the UK is causing more and more people to turn to food banks.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: According to one of Britain's biggest food bank networks, the Trussell Trust, a record 2.5 million parcels were given to people in crisis last year alone.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: And the six-year trend isn't any better.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Since 2015, the number of people needing help to obtain food has risen every year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Between 2020 and 2021, there was an increase of 33%. In 2015, the number of people needing help to obtain food has risen every year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Between 2020 and 2021, there was an increase of 33 percent.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: And the Trussell Trust says that 980,000 of those in need were children.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Many are putting this rise down to the hike in fuel, energy and food prices, as well as the pandemic.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: But for many of those needing help, it's a first. I think a lot of people in the situation who've never been in it before. I think I've been to a food bank once in my life and this is now my second. I normally put something in the food bank trellis when I go shopping because, yeah, but now it's my turn to have to have some milk.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: There is definitely people who have got jobs, who are working, who, because of the costs of living are so high now and their wages haven't gone up to meet those, then there are definitely more people who are working. But there are people who've lost their jobs.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The cost of living in Britain is forecast to soar higher in April as a tax hike is expected.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: For now, the number of food bank users is not likely to drop.
